item.description: Hartford Heights Tall Club will celebrate our 16th anniversary with a special brunch at the Nutmeg in South Windsor. The cost of $30 is all inclusive for brunch and includes a donation to the Marfans Foundation. In addition, we will have a teacup raffled to raise money for Marfans research. Reservations are a must, so we have enough room reserved. This event traditionally draws as many as 30 tall club members and prospective members, including guests from Massachusetts and New York.
item.name: Sweet Sixteen Anniversary Brunch
